title: Deportivo Nuevo Chimalhuacán
text: The Club Deportivo Nuevo Chimalhuacán, commonly known as Nuevo Chimalhuacán, is a Mexican <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Chimalhuac%C3%A1n">Chimalhuacán</a>. The club was founded in 2011, and currently plays in the <a href="Serie%20B%20de%20M%C3%A9xico">Serie B</a> of <a href="Liga%20Premier%20de%20M%C3%A9xico">Liga Premier</a>.
